english.segment1: Already I'm too far behind. To make this up to you. Apologies will never do
english.segment2: You were too young the times not right. Things did not seem on our side. We did what felt right. (for us to carry on)
english.segment3: Come what may we'll see this through. To give up on this love I found in you. I can not do
english.segment4: Summer crush turned into love. Take my hand we'll ride above. All the things that might face us
english.segment5: You're my best friend words can't comprehend. The outline of a love That strongly holds us up (for us to carry on)
english.segment6: Come what may we'll see this through. To give up on this love I found in you. I can not do
english.segment7: Some may say it's all the same. Yet promises have brought me here in faith. Growing stronger everyday. And with that we can face anything
english.segment8: Come what may we'll see this through. To give up on this love I found in you. Come what may we'll see this through. Come what may we'll see this. Come what may we'll see this through
english.segment9: To give up on this love I found in you. (I can not do)
